title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 83-2.13 - Hearing rights
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 83-2.13 - Hearing rights

State Regulations

No certificate of public advantage shall be revoked without affording the applicant an opportunity to request a hearing pursuant to Part 51 of this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
83-2.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
